alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 4:46PM EDT until August 09 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Madison, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Lee, Moseley Hall, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Hanson and Pinetta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
